site.name: Digital Twin Consortium - Singapore
site.description: Facilitating local Digital Twin Consortium activities in Singapore and Southeast Asia

about_sections.title: About The Regional Branch Organizer
paragraphs: Axomem has been appointed as the Regional Branch Organizer for Singapore and Southeast Asia to facilitate local Digital Twin Consortium® activities.
Axomem specializes in digital twin technology and enterprise software solutions, helping organizations build and deploy digital twins that drive operational excellence.
Axomem's CEO, Sean Whiteley, brings extensive experience in digital twin platforms and enterprise software to lead the Singapore Regional Branch.

about_sections.title: Co-founding Member
paragraphs: Dell Technologies is a co-founding member of the Digital Twin Consortium Singapore Regional Branch, bringing world-class infrastructure and edge computing capabilities to the digital twin ecosystem.
Dell's comprehensive portfolio of computing, storage, and networking solutions provides the foundation for enterprise-grade digital twin deployments across Southeast Asia.

about_sections.title: About The Digital Twin Consortium
paragraphs: Digital Twin Consortium® is The Authority in Digital Twin. It coalesces industry, government and academia to drive consistency in vocabulary, architecture, security and interoperability of digital twin technology.
It advances the use of digital twin technology from aerospace to natural resources.
Digital Twin Consortium is open to any business, organization or entity with an interest in digital twins.
Their global membership is committed to using digital twins throughout their operations and supply chains and capturing best practices and standards requirements for themselves and their clients.
